turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I have seen him again.  Last night.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: But you've not told Michael.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Lasher will act, Rowan.  Whatever it is he wants - he's waited three hundred years to have it.   facing him alone...  I don't like -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Lasher is my legacy - not Michael's.   Aaron, I've seen the pain in Michael.  I can't bear to see anymore.   He's not to know.  Swear to me.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Are you alright...?  You look pale.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I wish everyone would stop commenting on my health.  I'm the doctor.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: There are two.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Two what...?

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Two heartbeats.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: With his hands!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: But why would they do that...?

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: You've always said you felt goodness in them - that the witches brought you and Rowan together.  Isn't that right...?  They're reaching out to you, Rowan!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: But it doesn't make sense.  They - they used Lasher...  they conspired with him.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Who can say the hope of redemption dies with our last breath...? They must see what the legacy has wrought - Diedre, withered inside herself Carlotta, killing and stunting her own flesh and blood...  surely they sense the child you carry - and the life it might lead in Lashers grasp...   Maybe, in death, they feel remorse for the evil they embraced in life...?!

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Jesus I've got - to get to the ho--

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Rowan's already called the hotel, Michael.  At the cemetery by now, I would guess.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: How do you know about Rowan ...?  I didn't --- Cemetery...?

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: With her family.  Rowan's mother died yesterday.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Rowan's mother died at childbirth. And she doesn't have. any family.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: I ask only that you stay here, long enough to be - educated.  A few hours.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You sound certifiable. Yon know that.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I - r saw him as a child.  Lots of times...  But no one else did.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Come.  There is a lot to read

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: A what...?

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: A spirit.  Perhaps evil...   ...and he has come to you- with Diedre gone - you've... inherited him.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: No scaredy-cats in the Talamasca, huh...?

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: There is a difference between sensing danger - and being afraid.  what defines you in the landscape, Michael...?  what anchors your life...? Your work...?  Your creativity...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Rowan.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Then focus on how you feel about her. Because your feelings define you.   Take off your gloves, Michael.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Don't tell Rowan about this.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Michael, Rowan should -

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: NO!  she's pregnant, Aaron.  she's got that to deal with - and the clinic.. she is not to hear about this.   don't you think I know she spends half her lite worrying about me...  Listening to my heart, aren't you...?  The Timex still ticking...?

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: What have the witches always asked of you...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: "Go back, Michael.  Do what you can..."

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Yes - and you have.  Do you see...?  He was passing over into death - but the witches sent him back - to the one person they knew had the power to save him... and they gave him the power to show you what no one else could...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: on't know what else to do.  Maybe I just don't belong in her life.  well - I'm already out of her life.

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Nothing was ever more false.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Then tell me.  Is it Lasher....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'll probably be back in a week...but I can't spend Christmas in that house.   you'll check on her - every day...?

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Every day  twice.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Aaron - lieten to me...  It's been Lasher - from the start!

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: What are you talk---

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: He chose ME for ROWAN --- when I was a child!

turns.speaker: AARON
turns.text: Rowan...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You have to warn her - this second! I'm catching the next flight back!

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: Rowan - I'm Beatrice Maytair.  Your cousin.  Deedee...you'r mother and I - we - we grew up together.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I want to see my mother.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: I hope Ryan explained that if you stay in this town, you're shackled with pushy relations for the rest of your life.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: He made that quite clear, yes.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: Gifford - that box glued to your hands...?

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: Aren't they gauche...?   Those steel things are so - common.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Nothing worse than a common tool.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: You two sees like a perfect fit.   Only two mounths...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Mm-hmm.    Seems & lot longer.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: In the bayou, they have a saying... 'You choose the music for the dance - but fortune picks your partner.'   Darling, I'd say you're on a roll.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: Always give the crovd a taste, darling.  Now - Ryan said I'm supposed to make sure -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I don't want it.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: 'The heir to the fortune must wear the Mayfair pendant an her wedding day.'  We should all have to suffer such burdens.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Then you wear it.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: C'mon now - give a little nod to Mayfair tradition.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I'm sure he's alright, Bea. They'll find him somewhere.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: It's over a month.    The police say it happens all the time.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: Down here. darling, we figure: If you're taking a trip to God knows where - might as well have one hell of a going-away party.

turns.speaker: GIFFORD
turns.text: In certain cases, hell is the operative word.

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: Giff - shuttup.    you're mother was a sweet child, Rowan... A lost little girl in a world too full at things

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: You babbling that nonsense - now...? This is a wedding.

turns.speaker: GIFFORD
turns.text: I'm not saying I believe it...but I heard it 'nough times to know somebody did.   They made a deal with the devil.  Y'know - "make us rich" - worship the number thirteen - the whole bit.  And some stuff about 'bringing them all back through a door...'

turns.speaker: BEATRICE
turns.text: Gifford Mayfair - I'll cook your tongue on a spit!    witches!

turns.speaker: GIFFORD
turns.text: Hell - Julien believed it... Carlotta too... and god knows, more than a few of us called her a witch!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: E11ie - Diedre died at five o'clock this morning.    Obviously, there are 1egal matters.  Your discretion will be -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Hello...?  Who is this...?

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Who is this...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Rowan Mayfair.  Who's calling...?

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: I wish to speak to Ellie Mayfair.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I beg your par---

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: When did she die...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Who is this...?

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: This is your aunt.  Carlotta Mayfair.  In New Orleans.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I don't have any aunts - and I've never heard of a 'Carlotta' - or, for that matter - a 'Diedre'!  Just who -

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Diedre Mayfair was your mother.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: My...mother...?

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Yes.    Listen carefully, Rowan. Have your attorney contact me at once. There are matters of immediate -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: But my mother...  Ellie said she died -

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: I under5tand.  All the same

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: -Ellie said she died when I was BORN!  She's been alive...? ALL THIS TIME...? Why have I been lied to when -

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: I had you sent away.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Who the hel1 -

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: It was quite warranted by the - situation.    I realize this is a shock, but really, Rowan - you never even knew her. It's not as if you've suffered some great -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: What's the matter with you...?! What kind of person are you...?!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: A very tired one.  I've been up all night - and I would .like to rest before the funeral.     Have your lawyer -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: When is the funeral...?   I am coming to my mother's funeral!!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Out of the question      Rowan, coming here will not change the -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I'm coming down there!!  And it you put my mother in the ground betore I arrive, you'll wish you'd never seen my face!  IS THAT UNDERSTOOD...?!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: You came.    I'm your Aunt Carlotta, my dear.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I want to see my mother.  Where is she...?

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: In the coffin, my dear.  where else...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: She was alive all these years... You NEVER let me know her. Who gave you that right...?!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: A Mayfair it ever I saw one.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I might as well be Rowan Smith - or Jones!   you cut me off from every -

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: I'm tired.  I need to rest.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: There are things I have to know!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I don't want the -

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Other properties as well - here and in Europe.  And vest holdings - in sugar, oil, gold, electronics.  Liquid funds over eighty million.  tmpcssible to put a figure on it all. All yours now.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Eighty million doll --- ?

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: And this - if you decide to take the rest.

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: What is it...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: The lamplight.  That's all.

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: You can see well in the dark, Rowan.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Better than most, I suppose.

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Put your hatred for me aside, so you can clearly see what is ahead-

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You kept her in this filth in restraints...?.

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: She didn't feel them

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You're a monster.

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Antha...your grandmother...her life ended there, on the stones. Head split open like a melon.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Why are you doing this...?  Handing out these horrors! Why...?!!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: You have the Mayfair eyes.   Tell me, Rowan --- what have those eyes seen that the mind can't fathom...?

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: He's shown himself to you... on the deck.  In the storm.

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Lasher touched you and you loved it.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: It wes a dream...!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Just like your mother - and all the others that felt him - and used his power - and went to hell with a smile!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Stop it!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Witches. Rowan.  that is what we are.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: ENOUGH!!!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: And that is why I pushed your grandmother onto the stones - even as she had him inside her...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You're mad!  Your mind is sick!

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: ...and why I put thirty years between you and the beautiful monster. To kill the legacy!    you are the sum of his desires -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You - are - a - murderer.

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: But I had to use my hands.  None before you could kill with their mind.  Graham, my dear.  Your uncle...?

turns.speaker: CARLOTTA
turns.text: Did you like it...? Looking down at Graham and knowing what you could do...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I'm NOT like you!  I'm NOT! You're cruel -

turns.speaker: DEBORAH
turns.text: Mum...  Oh Mum, God will surely strike us -

turns.speaker: SUZANNE
turns.text: Wind - I love you with that which is endless within me.  Bring me your eyes - your touch - your voice...

turns.speaker: SUZANNE
turns.text: Go back, MICHAEL... Go Back

turns.speaker: DEBORAH
turns.text: The door, Michael.  find the key...

turns.speaker: SUZANNE
turns.text: Help us.  Do what you can.

turns.speaker: DEBORAH
turns.text: Michael...  Do what you can.

turns.speaker: SUZANNE
turns.text: Michael...  Help us...  The door!

turns.speaker: SUZANNE
turns.text: Lasher - bring us through!

turns.speaker: DEBORAH
turns.text: Now, lasher - it is our time.

turns.speaker: DOCTOR
turns.text: Parents say he - uh - fell -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Anybody got a BP yet...?

turns.speaker: DOCTOR
turns.text: - and he seemed okay.  Just banged his -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: FAST.

turns.speaker: DOCTOR
turns.text: uh - then he - be just -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: He just went out like & light-

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Massive subdural hamatoma.  We have to evacuat it - right now.

turns.speaker: DOCTOR
turns.text: I'll tell OR we're bringing -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: He's herniating!  Forget OR.  He's dead batore he's oft the elevator Get me a trephine tray -  Anesthesia - stat!  We need him intubated and blow down!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: You do not love Michael   How can you love - if you lie...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Lie...?

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: There are things you will not tell him.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Yes, Michael.  Harder--.  More...

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Like this...?

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: I am with you, my love. Like no other can ever be.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Nooo...  NO!  Stop!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: STOP!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Always loved you..

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: The wasps were meant for Michael - but there's only so much you can control, isn't there?  The great and powerful lasher - undone by a faulty ladder-..  Why would you hurt him...?!  Answer me.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: I 1ove you, Rowan.  I've always loved you.  I only wanted to be in your thoughts. To bring myself into your thoughts - so I could be as we are now.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: YOU VIOLATED ME!!!  ON MY WEDDING NIGHT!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Explain this to me --- violated...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You bastard...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Made it...?

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: It is from love.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: To love, you must be able to feel.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: If you knew how I yearn for that...

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: If I could feel like you feel...but I have only others' feelings - . . like breeres that blow through me.  Things to be felt, yes --- but not nine to feel...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: It you harm Michael, I will let my anger loose.  And you will feel that. Do you understand...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You're very clever, aren't you...?

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: I am only what you are --- what all of you have been.   what do you think of yourself now, my love...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I'm going to have a baby.   Michael wants to name it after you - if it's a girl.  Diedre Mayfair Curry. Pretty, huh...?  Funny --- I never really thought I'd ever ---

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: I bring her flowers too.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: There is no one here but the dead.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Go away!  I don't want you here.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: If that were true, I would not be here.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: It's very dangerous to assume you know what a woman wants.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: From the night on the moor, when I was swept into the world and first knew this exquisite pain - it is a Mayfair who has wanted me!  suzann. and Deborah.  Stella - Marguerite - Antha  - Diedre -  All of them.  And you will have a child...

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: A girl...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: It's too soon to know.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: you crave what I might show you.  What you can learn.  What I can give you.  So much more than Michael can.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: What Michael gives me is stronger than anything you could ever inderstand.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: But I could understand. I want to understand!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I LOVE him!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Do not tell me that!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I LOVE MICHAEL.  MICHAEL!!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I know that you're evil.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: I only wanted to see as others do... feel as others do...  ...but Marguerite could not help me.  Nor Julien...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: And now you expect me to stockpile corpses for you...?!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: No, my love.  I want nothing more of the dead.  I want you to --- chang me.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: I've waited for you - the one whose science could match her powers...  Do you know what it's like - to sense the majesty of something so sublime just beyond your reach...?  to float in a dream that keeps a .promise half-hidden in its shadows.-.?  I did not choose to be such as this!  Suzanne brought me here.  She called to me!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: But have I...?  Ever...?!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: --- and I have heard you from the beginning... from it's very first beat.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I love Michael...

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Then help me--- for his sake...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You mustn't hurt him. Mustn't - mustn't hurt..

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Focus all your powers on me, Rowan until it is done. Only me...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Only you...

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Change me, Rowan, and we can change everything...

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Go on. Rowan.  Go on.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Leave me alone!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: What is wrong...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Wrong...?  Science is not magic.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: I do not understand...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You went into the cells --- and you changed them.  How...?!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: There was no thought.  There was no act.    That is not what I am.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I don't know what you are!!!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: That is what you must discover.   see what I am, my love. With all your power - see me, and know what I am.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: No!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Tell me what I am, Rowan.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Aaron was in the dream.  A dream tilled with spirits.   you killed him, didn't you...?

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: It was an accident.   Gifford, too.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: The portraits, Lasher.  Why are the witches always before a door...? Tell me, Lasher.  Now!

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: They want to come back.    We have a pact - of mutual desire and  consent.  The Mayfairs ar. a beautiful tapestry.  I have weaved you all together - from the start.   I brought Petyr Van Abel to Suzanne.  He had genius in him.  Scientific, precise.  It was a perfect start. And on  it has gone - father to mother... sister to brother... father to daughter...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Oh god...

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Ju1ien was your father   Your great-grandfather - your grandfather - and your father. All one in the same...  That is why he fought carlotta for your life.

turns.speaker: LASHER
turns.text: Rowan and I will be together now. My time has come.  Your time is gone.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: No!   Don't!  Lasher!!!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Put - him - down!  His - his heart...

turns.speaker: LASHER THE MAN
turns.text: How is your heart, Father...? Is the Timex still ticking...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Let me go...  Michaelllllll...

turns.speaker: LASHER THE MAN
turns.text: ENOUGH!  He is dead.  You are here for me now.  Michael is gone!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I'll destroy you.  I swear it!  If you don't kill me, I'll find a -

turns.speaker: LASHER THE MAN
turns.text: 'Kill you...?'  You are my mother.  Do you think I would hurt you...?

turns.speaker: LASHER THE MAN
turns.text: I am your son.  I would not wound you. I could not - ever.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I know.    you are my son -

turns.speaker: ROWAN'S VOICE [IN HER HEAD]
turns.text: Harder...

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE [IN HER HEAD]
turns.text: Rowan...

turns.speaker: ROWAN'S VOICE [IN HER HEAD]
turns.text: Harder...

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE [IN HER HEAD]
turns.text: Like this...  LIKE THIS...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN'S VOICE [IN HER HEAD]
turns.text: Yessss...

turns.speaker: MAN'S VOICE [IN HER HEAD]
turns.text: Always loved you. Rowan.  Always...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: They like you ------- kids.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I guess so.  The trick is remembering how to act like one.  I'm glad you called, Mr. Curry. I wanted to see you.  Why don't we go to my office...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I've read the stories - and seen the news coverage.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: 'Freak at the week.'   That's what the TV crew. call it-  people come right to the house.  They have a husband or wife who skipped town - or a missing kid-  They bring a sweater or a toy - and ask me to touch it. so I can teel them where they are..

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I don't remember you at all-  You - you saved my life-  Bizarre thing to say, isn't it...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I'm glad you're around to say it.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: My jury's still out on that,

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Then call it in. Mr. Curry. Whatever's happeninq to you - death is not the preferable alternative.  I'm in the life business - remember..?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Do they keep everything 'out' ...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: As far as touching things, yes. But the vision - that keeps pouring into my head-    It won't go away God - if I could just understand it.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: What do you see...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Nothing.  Absolutely nothing-

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Just one.  The bar's closed.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: The one time I want it to work...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You know - doors and keyholes are common signposts in out-of-body -

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You're not gonna give me the textbook analysia, are you doctor...? My vision was just the chemical reaction of an oxygen-starved brain - and nobody -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: No. I'm not.  Doctors should be the first ones to admit utter ignorance about some things.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Harder...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Rowan...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: HARDER!

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Like this...?  LIKE THIS...?!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Yessssss...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: you're very --- different.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I'll bet you say that to all the women who bring you back to life and then seduce you.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: What else did you see- Michael...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What're you - a mindreader...?  Who was the man on the kitchen floor. ~.?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: My uncle.  Graham.  He and my Aunt, Ellie raised me.  He - he - had a stroke-  Just before Ellie died - of cancer. Last year.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You knelt there, helpless-  You couldn't save him.   There was so such anger in you-.   Death infuriates you...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: It's unbelievable that you can do that.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It - it feels like - like I'm being filled up. crowded out of myself.   Like I'm fading away-

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: My mother and I used to take long walks and make up stories about the houses and the people who lived inside.  The Queen's house-. the Gangster's house-. the clown's house- Like that.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: And whose houses do you design...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Oh. The Green underwater Ghost's...  The Man With The Eyes In His Hands...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You still feel that crazy...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I was born, in New Orleans, too-

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Really...?  Your family there...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Nope-  My father died before I was born. My mother died in childbirth.   El1ie was my only blood relation.  so she brought me here... the day after I was born.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Too much... too fast...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Mm-hmm.     Scared-  I feel a little like the moth and the flame.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: He's very pleased with your response to the surroundings.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: He fools around with his patients too.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: you touched him --- and saw him...? What was he doinging.  Kinky...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It's come to that, huh...?  Three weeks - and you need a psychic skin flick to perk up our sex life...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You look very deep when you do that.  It's interesting.  We're Complete opposites-  I'd never just sit and wait for insparation.  I'd skip my turn and swap some letters.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Ms. yin, and Mr. yang  Aha!

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Y-U-H-E-E-Y-A-H.  Yu-hee-yah...? No way, busters use it in a sentence.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Okay.     y'all make sure and come back now, reeeeal soon - yu'heeyah.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Why don't you let at do that...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Just sit there and soak up the vitamin D.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Doctor's orders- - -?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Captain's orders.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Far from it, Michael... Don't put me up there.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: All I meant was -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You don't know what you meant -  because you don't know me.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Christ, Michael - what the hell are we doing...?  We don't even know -

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Is this the part where you try and talk yourself out of how good this is...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I'm serious.  You don't -

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Let's see...  Next you tell me all the terrible things about you - and prove that we're doomed to fail - right...?   you hate kittens and puppies, you've drivin all your lovers to suicide --and those mysterious deaths at the hospital were really -

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Stop it.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You stop it.  you're loving, and gentel..  You're the most remarkable woman I've ever met --- so stop telling me I don't know what I feel just cause you're scared.  Cause it won't work.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Seems more like a year than a month.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Michael - this place is increadible.  You - you're brilliant...  The things you created...

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: I called Dr. Styles at the Neurological Institute  In L.A., remember...?  He said he'd see you.  He was intrigned.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: God knows, I'm intriguing.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: Michael, do you want to wear those for the rest of your life...?

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: You could fly down tomorrow.  I could be there the next day  I think I can last that long without you.

turns.speaker: ROWAN
turns.text: We're quite a pair, you and I.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Mad. for each other.
